CFPB Simple Grids

Based on: http://csswizardry.com/2011/08/building-better-grid-systems/

12-Column Percent-Based Grid: Proposed for CF.gov

Note: This grid using the same class names as Twitter Bootstrap, so converting to Bootstrap would be fairly painless.

The gutter is 2% of the total width.
